page.description: Defines the indicator shown for a record in the List that has been deleted.

discussion.p: The *[ui:CSS - Deleted record row indicator]* property is the CSS applied to a row in the List that has been deleted. Out of the box ,the indicator shown is a purple triangle in the upper right-hand corner of the List row for the deleted record.

figure.title: The delete record row indicator, a purple triangle

description.p: Use the *[ui:Default css]* link in the Define CSS dialog located below the text area to insert the default CSS for the row indicator.
Leave blank to use the default CSS.

figure.title: 'Default css' for the delete record row indicator.
